rbp_internal_size.help: If default the size will be 4K*#entries/32

internal_base_address.help: If default, base address is the first sector after the application code

filesystem.help: Options are default, FAT or LITTLE. If default value the filesystem is chosen by the blockdevice type

blockdevice.help: Options are default, SPIF, DATAFASH, QSPIF or SD. If default, the block device will be chosen according to the component defined in targets.json

external_size.help: Size in bytes of the external block device, if default value, the maximum size available is used.

external_base_address.help: The default will set start address to address 0

folder_path.help: Path for the working directory where the FileSystemStore stores the data
